price: (42) Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
